title: Healing Jewellery | Healing Gemstone Jewellery | Natural Crystal Jewellery | Natural Healing Crystals & Healing Gemstones | Spiritual Guidance & Healing | Healing Gemstone Jewellery UK | Charms Of Light - Healing
description: Reiki healing spiritual jewellery using natural crystals and gemstones, magical crystals and gemstone carvings, spiritual guidance and healing, meditation music, healing crystals and their meanings.
cleaned_text: Of Light® ~ Healing Jewellery, Natural Crystals & Gemstone Gifts, Spiritual Guidance and Healing Charms Of Light was initially created to bring healing and beauty together in the form of healing jewellery, natural healing crystals and gemstone gifts. A natural intuitive, teacher and healer, I am spiritually guided to provide healing with energy, light and love ~~ [September Birthstones](/birthstones-by-month/september-birthstones) are Blue Sapphire and Lapis Lazuli. September is the birth month for [Virgo](/zodiac-birthstones/virgo-gemstones/) and [Libra](/zodiac-birthstones/libra-gemstones/). ~~ Healing Jewellery My range of healing crystal jewellery is created with love and healing intentions. Healing jewellery is sometimes called Spiritual Jewellery, or Reiki Jewellery, because of the prayers and Reiki healing energies that are used in their creation. Semi precious gemstones and healing crystals are used in a variety of more. You can also have a [custom design](/custom-designs) created especially for you. All are designed to be healing as well as beautiful. Natural Healing Crystals and Healing Gemstones Please Note: This collection is closing down! Purchase while stock is still available! All natural healing crystals and healing gemstone gifts are charged with Reiki energy to further enhance the healing properties of each piece. Magical healing crystals and gemstone carvings, include: lovely natural [Tumble Stones](/healing-crystals/tumble-stones/) to choose from, or you could have a beautiful [Crystal Charm or Keychain](/healing-crystals/charms-and-keychains/) made especially for you. Spiritual Guidance & Healing With love and healing intentions, my spiritual guidance and healing services are focused around YOU, helping and empowering you to heal and to understand who you are, so you can BE that person. It is only then that you can become the best you can be for others too! Spiritual guidance and healing include: [Angel Guidance [Meditation Music](/healing-gifts/meditation-music/) is also available. Healing Crystals, Gemstones & their Meanings [Gemstone and crystal healing properties](/gemstone-crystal-healing-properties) give you comprehensive information about healing crystals and their meanings, while you can also discover your [birthstones](/birthstones-zodiac-gemstones), learn about [chakra healing](/chakra-healing), find out why [colour healing](/colour-healing) is meaningful, and much more! Please feel free to take a look around. Special requests, Commissions, International customers - always welcome! If you like this site and/or find it helpful, please tell a friend and [contact me](/contact.html) to let me know. Any and all comments or suggestions are welcome and appreciated. Blessings, Caryl
